Name: Chocolate Cake
Instructions: 1. Mix the dry ingredients together. 2. Add the wet ingredients and stir well. 3. Pour the batter into a cake pan and bake at 350°F (175°C) for 30 minutes.

Name: Spaghetti Carbonara
Instructions: 1. Cook the spaghetti. 2. Fry the pancetta until crispy. 3. Beat the eggs with parmesan and pepper. 4. Combine everything in a hot pan off the heat, stirring quickly to create a creamy sauce.

Name: Caesar Salad
Instructions: 1. Wash and chop the romaine lettuce. 2. Toss with croutons, parmesan, and Caesar dressing. 3. Serve chilled.

Name: Apple Pie
Instructions: 1. Prepare the pie crust and place it in a baking dish. 2. Mix sliced apples with sugar, cinnamon, and a bit of flour. 3. Fill the crust with the apple mixture. 4. Top with another layer of crust and bake at 375°F (190°C) for about 50 minutes.
